step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply when rolling your shoulders back.
Second set starting well. Try to keep the movement smooth and controlled.
Excellent! You're really getting the hang of that circular motion.
Fantastic finish! You completed all repetitions with good form, supporting lymphatic flow and mobility.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Breathing deeply during the backward motion helps improve oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work!
